name: Serverless Guy
body:
### Serverless samples

#### Serverless application with Lambda (nodejs) + DynamoDB

A simple application with CRUD API (create, read, update, delete, list) that is built with Serverless, AWS Lambda (nodejs), AWS API Gateway, and AWS DynamoDB.

* Github repo: [serverless-node-dynamodb-example](https://github.com/markusklems/serverless-node-dynamodb-example)
* Video: ...
* Slideshare: ...

### AWS Lambda samples

* AWS Lambda (Java): sample application that consists of three Lambda functions using DynamoDB with triggers
* AWS Lambda (nodejs): code fragments
